solution_line_template: Sheila will be saving for {saving_years} years which is equivalent to {months_per_year} months/year * {saving_years} years = <<{months_per_year}*{saving_years}={total_months}>>{total_months} months
In {saving_years} years, she will save ${monthly_saving}/month * {total_months} months = $<<{monthly_saving}*{total_months}={savings_over_time}>>{savings_over_time}
The piggy bank will have a total of ${current_total} + ${savings_over_time} = $<<{current_total}+{savings_over_time}={final_total}>>{final_total}
